scripts.release:patch: powershell -NoProfile -Command "npm version patch -m 'Release v%s'; git push --follow-tags; $v=(Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; $tag='v'+$v; gh release create $tag -t $tag -n 'Automated patch release' --verify-tag"
scripts.release:minor: powershell -NoProfile -Command "npm version minor -m 'Release v%s'; git push --follow-tags; $v=(Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; $tag='v'+$v; gh release create $tag -t $tag -n 'Automated minor release' --verify-tag"
scripts.release:major: powershell -NoProfile -Command "npm version major -m 'Release v%s'; git push --follow-tags; $v=(Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; $tag='v'+$v; gh release create $tag -t $tag -n 'Automated major release' --verify-tag"
scripts.release:rc: powershell -NoProfile -Command "npm version prerelease --preid rc -m 'Prerelease v%s'; git push --follow-tags; $v=(Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; $tag='v'+$v; gh release create $tag -t $tag -n 'Automated prerelease' --verify-tag --prerelease"
scripts.release:final: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$v=(Get-Content package.json -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json).version; if($v -match '^(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)'){ $stable=$Matches[1]; npm version $stable -m 'Release v%s'; git push --follow-tags; gh release create v$stable -t v$stable -n 'Promote rc to stable' --verify-tag } else { Write-Error 'No prerelease version (x.y.z-*) found'; exit 1 }"
